p: Analysis of survival time indicated that groups which took the higher two doses (400 mg/kg and 800 mg/kg) significantly outlived ( p < 0.05) their negative control counterpart. Moreover, comparison among the extract's doses indicated that 400 mg/kg and 800 mg/kg caused a significantly longer survival time ( p < 0.05) as compared to 100 mg/kg. The positive control was also having significant effect both against the negative control ( p < 0.001) and the extract's dose ( p < 0.001) Table 1.
